name: tm84
effect: Teaches Poison Jab to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Poison Jab to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text.diamond-pearl: The foe is stabbed with a tentacle or arm seeped with poison. It may also poison the foe.
